abstract: Greg Smith introduced Muppets into the Goldman Sachs lexicon, a casino lawsuit was revived in Macau, Yahoo sued Facebook, and the S.E.C. won a legal victory against Judge Jed S. Rakoff. A look back on our reporting of the past week’s highs and lows in finance.
snippet: Greg Smith introduced Muppets into the Goldman Sachs lexicon, a casino lawsuit was revived in Macau, Yahoo sued Facebook, and the S.E.C. won a legal victory against Judge Jed S. Rakoff. A look back on our reporting of the past week’s highs and low...
lead_paragraph: Greg Smith introduced Muppets into the Goldman Sachs lexicon, a casino lawsuit was revived in Macau, Yahoo sued Facebook, and the S.E.C. won a legal victory against Judge Jed S. Rakoff. A look back on our reporting of the past week’s highs and lows in finance.
